name: BUY A "LOT"
description:
THIS WAS MY FIRST GAME JAM.  I made in less than 48 hours.
For me was a BIG challenge.

Theme : " A lot of..."

This game was made for Quarantine Jam. My idea was to portray a lot in the paranoia of people with toilet paper.

You need to be as fast as possible to buy all toilet paper rolls. They maybe missed, who knows, BUT watch out for the employee that he can get you out of the store. Be FAST 

Controls :
W/A/S/D - To Move  and Left Shift - To Sprint 

Left Mouse. Down - To Pick up

Left Mouse. Up - To Throw

I am learning to program and model in 3D, if you find a bug it will be divided due to lack of experience.

Please leave or feedback in comments, is important to me.

Have Fun, Dream'Studio
